        Assignment 3: String to Binary

010010100000110111110010110111001111010011000110100111000101110011100011110011100011110111001111110111110010

010111110100010011011000010111001001110011100011

010111001001110011100011

100011110111010011011000110111010001010111110100

100011101001110111001111010011100101
